title: Sanitizer: Your First Line of Defense
content: - Sanitizer is a liquid or gel that kills germs on your hands.
It's important to use sanitizer when you can't wash your hands with soap and water.
Sanitizer can help prevent the spread of germs that cause illness.
image_desc: A bottle of hand sanitizer with a pump dispenser.
narration: Sanitizer is a powerful tool in the fight against germs. It's a quick and easy way to clean your hands when soap and water aren't available. Simply apply a small amount of sanitizer to your hands and rub it in until your hands are dry. Sanitizer can help you stay healthy and prevent the spread of illness.
